title: Stock Futures Tick Up Ahead of Jobs Report
sub_head: Meme stocks GameStock and AMC Entertainment rally premarket
body:
U.S. stock futures edged up ahead of the latest jobs report that is expected to provide insight into the labor market recovery and monetary policy ahead.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 added 0.2% Friday, pointing to the broad-market index recouping losses after closing down 0.1% in Thursdayâ€™s choppy session. Dow Jones Industrial Average futures climbed 0.3% and Nasdaq-100 futures were relatively flat.
